description.narrative: The proposed project development objectives (PDOs) are the following: i) improve public sector management and accountability by establishing results-based management practices and improving fiduciary oversight; and (ii) increase access, quality and efficiency of the education, health and public transport services (by modernizing the education system; modernizing, decentralizing and integrating various levels of health care; and strengthening the institutional and operational capacity of the public transport sector).

condition.narrative: The Borrower and the Bank may jointly review the amounts assigned per budget line to the Eligible Expenditure Program detailed inSchedule 4 of the Agreement.
The Borrower shall carry out audits of the Financial Statements for each Fiscal Year.
The Borrower shall conduct independent annual audits focused on the achievement of the technical results that are linked todisbursement of the Loan.
The Borrower shall furnish to the Bank a Procurement audit report for each fiscal year.
The Borrower shall furnish to the Bank a Project Report each calendar semester.
The Borrower shall furnish to the Bank a report on the execution of the Project.
The Borrower shall furnish to the Bank as part of the Project Report interim unaudited financial reports each semester.

title.narrative: Implement full-time basic education activities in low-income areas of DF in 100 schools.
Secretariats/GDF agencies issue annual performance reports.
DFTRANS remotely monitors 10% of the fleet of the basic bus service.

comment.narrative: Target not achieved. CCO not procured.

title.narrative: Execute at least 70% of the budget of each EEP.

comment.narrative: Target not achieved. Education 56%, Health 53%, Transport 55%

title.narrative: Secretariats/GDF agencies sign annual Results Agreements.
Provide the Cartao de Saude to 50% of the population.
Decrease the number of students with overage distortion rate in Secondary Education.

comment.narrative: Target not achieved, information provided not satisfactory.

title.narrative: Cover 40% population with Family Health Program
Cover 80% pregnant women with at least 4 prenatal visits in Brazil, India, Paranoa, Riacho Fundo, and Samambaia.
Increase access to early childhood programs in low-income Regional Areas (RA) for children aged 4-5.
Decrease number of students with overage distortion rate in Basic Education.

comment.narrative: Target not achieved, information provided not satisfactory.

title.narrative: DFTRANS controls operational and fare revenue data of the basic bus service.

baseline.value: DFTRANS has partial access to secondary operational & fare revenue data

target.value: DFTRANS processes primary operational & fare revenue data on a daily basis

comment.narrative: Target not achieved. Control of information by DFTRANS deemed not trustworthy. Sistema de Bilhetagem Automático not done due tolack of capacity.
